nodes.text: "Miss Theelin" was a live beauty pageant held during the winter season that was available for entry by female Theelin. A number of promotional posters, colored purple, orange, and gray and each featuring a Theelin woman and Aurebesh text, were posted around the galaxy for the contest during the final years of the Galactic Republic; such locations included the bar Trueping's on the planet Coruscant, aboard a Turtle Tanker starship, and the spaceport of Pons Ora on Abafar. During the reign of the Galactic Empire, the Lasat Garazeb Orrelios kept a "Miss Theelin" poster pinned next to his bunk aboard the freighter Ghost.

"Miss Theelin" was first shown on a poster illustrated by Randy Bantog that appeared in "Deception," the fifteenth episode of the canon animated series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' fourth season, which originally aired on January 20, 2012. The poster reoccurred throughout the series and later reappeared in the animated series Star Wars Rebels.
